title: Shark Bait
summaries: The Shark Bait is a pet-summoning item that summons a pet Shark Pup. When underwater, the Shark Pup swims around freely. When out of water, it is encased in a bubble. When the player is too far away, the Shark Pup will move swiftly toward them. The Shark Bait has a 1/2 (50%) chance of being found in Water Chests and a 1/10 (10%) chance of being found in Ocean and Seaside Crates.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a Shark Pup
'Doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo'
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
